Freestyle Movement
Classes Events Practices

Join the movement

Freestyle Movement creates opportunities for bboys, bgirls, choreographers and freestyle dancers to grow and build the Hiphop community in Edmonton. We teach classes, organize competitions and run a weekly open practice session.

Next practice session

7:00 - 10:30 PM

Brookview Breaking Class Registration

  • Beginner class
  • Recommended Age: 12-17
  • Location: Brookview Community League
  • Dates: August 3 - November 30, 2021
  • Time: Tuesday night 6:00 PM to 7:00 PM

Dancers under 12 can still participate if they have breaking experience.
